vlive.korean: 이거 불량품인가? Is this a defect product? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 켠셰프의 쿸쿸 with 주허니 #8
혹시 '오 이거 막 불량품 아니야?' You might think, "Is this a defect?" 듣기 View video iKON : 잠깐 쉬는시간~!
vlive.english: You might think, "Is this a defect?"

vlive.korean: 그거는 약간 불량품 아니에요? - 불량품... Doesn't it mean that the water filter is a defect? - It's a defect. 듣기 View video NCT : VOICE ONLY ㅋ
vlive.english: Doesn't it mean that the water filter is a defect? - It's a defect.

vlive.korean: 그건 불량품이잖아 - 가로막고 있는 거 아니야? It's a defect. - Are you just blocking the water? 듣기 View video NCT : VOICE ONLY ㅋ
vlive.english: It's a defect. - Are you just blocking the water?

vlive.korean: 불량품 아니야? Isn't it defective? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스테이를 위한 향수 만들기🖤

examples.korean: I was given a refund because of the defective product. 발음듣기 나는 불량품 때문에 환불을 받았다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: I was given a refund because of the defective product. 발음

examples.korean: A Seoul Metropolitan Government survey of 4,000 adults conducted from November to December last year showed 30 percent of those who purchase "faulty" goods from social media platforms had failed to get a refund or a response. 발음듣기 서울시가 지난해 11월부터 12월까지 성인 4,000명을 대상으로 조사한 결과, 소셜미디어 플랫폼에서 불량품을 구매한 사람의 30%가 환불이나 답변을 받지 못한 것으로 나타났다. The Korea Times
examples.english: A Seoul Metropolitan Government survey of 4,000 adults conducted from November to December last year showed 30 percent of those who purchase "faulty" goods from social media platforms had failed to get a refund or a response. 발음

examples.korean: Many social media stars have been using this method of advertising and selling goods on social media platforms to attract consumers. However, this case suggests that several issues, such as a lack of transparency and defective products, may emerge from influencer marketing. 발음듣기 많은 소셜미디어 스타들이 소셜미디어 플랫폼상에서 상품을 광고하고 판매하는 방법을 사업을 위해 사용해왔다. 그러나 이번 사건은 투명성 부족과 불량품 같은 여러 문제가 인플루언서 마케팅의 문제가 될 수 있음을 시사한다. The Korea Times
examples.english: Many social media stars have been using this method of advertising and selling goods on social media platforms to attract consumers. However, this case suggests that several issues, such as a lack of transparency and defective products, may emerge from influencer marketing. 발음

examples.korean: He took a little test drive and agreed the car was a lemon. 발음듣기 그는 시험 주행을 해 보고 그 차가 불량품이라는 데 동의했다. Neungyule
examples.english: He took a little test drive and agreed the car was a lemon. 발음

examples.korean: I do not want to make substandard music. 발음듣기 난 불량품을 만들고 싶지 않다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I do not want to make substandard music. 발음
